Header.title: S imam
Header.paragraph: From screen printing to DTF, custom mugs to branding services — we deliver premium quality at affordable prices.

About.paragraph: We're passionate about delivering top-notch print services with a modern touch. Based in Kano, Nigeria, our mission is to make custom printing accessible, fast, and stunning. Whether you're a business, a brand, or an individual — we’ve got you covered!

Services.name: Screen Printing
Services.text: High-quality screen printing for t-shirts, uniforms, and promotional items — perfect for bulk orders with sharp designs.

Services.name: DTF (Direct to Film)
Services.text: Get vibrant and durable prints with our Direct-to-Film service, suitable for detailed graphics on any fabric type.

Services.name: Mug Printing
Services.text: Personalized mug printing for birthdays, brands, or giveaways — make every sip memorable.

Services.name: Branding & Packaging
Services.text: Boost your business identity with custom packaging, branded boxes, stickers, and tags that stand out.

Services.name: Sublimation Printing
Services.text: Full-color sublimation printing on fabrics and items — long-lasting and washable with no cracking or fading.

Services.name: Corporate Gifting
Services.text: Custom gift items for your clients or staff — mugs, tees, key holders, and branded kits to make a lasting impression.
